item.title: L'Ã©quipe
item.description: ðŸ’¡ You can change the commands in the scripts section of `./package.json`. create Create new content for your site: npm run create [path] [flags] See also the Hugo docs: hugo new. lint Check scripts, styles, and markdown for errors: npm run lint scripts Check scripts for errors: npm run lint:scripts [-- --fix] styles Check styles for errors: npm run lint:styles [-- --fix] markdown Check markdown for errors:
